data.message: Facebook my friend is trying to create an account for her son as he has come of age where he can get a Facebook account her partner and her other son wants to change his name per as it is on his depoll and your system is saying their name is not a real name and to use his everyday name???  Please can someone help as no one is replying to her pm and this needs sorting out.  Thank you.

replies.message: Hi there! Facebook is a community where people use the name they go by in everyday life. This way, you always know who you're connecting with. Your friend can find more information about changing names in our Help Center:  http://bit.ly/2jzE0jb. -Mollie
Facebook that doesnt help we cannot create an account using their name faceboook says its not a real name when it is xxx
